data.comment: Walter (Corinthians) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The match is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 1, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Fluminense to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Free kick Fluminense.
Gabriel for Corinthians has been booked by Braulio da Silva Machado and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 5, Gabriel is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense are coming forward and Calegari gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Gabriel is back on his feet again.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Goal! Nene gives Fluminense a 1-0 lead.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Corinthians.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
In the minute 10, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Corinthians a goal kick.
In the minute 12, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 15, Attention is being given to Fluminense’s Marcos Paulo and play has been suspended briefly.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense's Marcos Paulo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Corinthians.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Everaldo is replacing Ederson for Corinthians at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 19, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Corinthians throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Can Corinthians capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 21, Romulo Otero (Corinthians) strikes – and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Fluminense have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Corinthians at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 24, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Can Corinthians get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
In the minute 26, Nino is on a sub for Digao for Fluminense.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Corinthians.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 28, Fluminense's Nene breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 34, Corinthians to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Corinthians throw-in in Fluminense's half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 36, Corinthians's Romulo Otero has run offside.
Free kick for Corinthians in the half of Fluminense.
Dodi (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 38, Corinthians's Romulo Otero gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Throw-in Fluminense.
In the minute 39, Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Everaldo for Corinthians gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Corinthians.
At Estadio do Maracana the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 45, Corinthians have a goal kick.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fluminense push upfield and Danilo Barcelos gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Corinthians defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Fluminense's Nene misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 45, Braulio da Silva Machado blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fluminense just outside Corinthians's area.
The away team have replaced Gustavo Silva with Mateus Vital. This is the second substitution made today by Tiago Nunes.
Bruno Mendez (Corinthians) gets a yellow card.
In Rio de Janeiro, Nene of Fluminense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Corinthians's area.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for Fluminense in Rio de Janeiro.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corinthians have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Can Corinthians capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Corinthians have an attacking throw-in.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 54, Gabriel of Corinthians gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Corinthians.
In the minute 55, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 58, The away team replace Gabriel with Ramiro.
Guilherme Camacho is replacing Victor Cantillo for the away team.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro Corinthians drive forward through Everaldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 61, Odair Hellmann is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Luiz Henrique replacing Michel Araujo.
Fluminense make their third substitution with Felippe Cardoso replacing Marcos Paulo.
Michel of Corinthians is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 64, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Fluminense throw-in in Corinthians's half.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fluminense.
In the minute 66, Nene (Fluminense) has received a yellow card from Braulio da Silva Machado.
Corinthians's Guilherme Camacho has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 67, Fluminense are pushing forward but Nene's finish is wide of the goal.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Corinthians a goal kick.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
In the minute 68, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Corinthians.
Nino of Fluminense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Danilo Barcelos, who is down injured.
Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
Danilo Barcelos has recovered and rejoins the match in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 72, Can Corinthians capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wellington Silva (Fluminense) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Corinthians in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sidcley is replacing Lucas Piton Crivellaro for the away team.
In the minute 79, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a throw-in for Corinthians, close to Fluminense's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 81, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hudson for Fluminense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The home team replace Wellington Silva with Ganso.
In the minute 83, It seems as if Hudson is unable to continue. Yago Felipe replaces him for the home team.
Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Corinthians are coming forward and Ramiro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Corinthians defence as Calegari fires in a strike for Fluminense.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Corinthians.
An attacking Fluminense player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Nene smashes in a penalty at Estadio do Maracana. The score is now 2-0.
Mateus Vital of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick in a good position for Corinthians!
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Corinthians territory.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense attack through Yago Felipe. The finish is off target, however.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
Free kick Corinthians.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Corinthians a goal kick.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Danilo Barcelos (Fluminense) sees red and is sent off in Rio de Janeiro!
Mateus Vital strikes to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Estadio do Maracana.
Gil with an assist there.
